alert.note: Alert for Brown; Keya Paha; Rock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 12 at 11:55PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ROCK...NORTHERN BROWN AND SOUTHEASTERN KEYA PAHA COUNTIES... At 1154 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 11 miles southwest of Springview, moving east-southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bassett, Long Pine, Keller Park State Recreation Area, Thomas Creek State Wildlife Management Area, Bobcat State Wildlife Management Area, Pine Glen State Wildlife Refuge, Antelope Peak and Meadville. This includes the following highways... Highway 183 between mile markers 194 and 212. Highway 20 between mile markers 245 and 259. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
